prompts: Create a Psychic-type Pokemon that looks like a sleepy creature with yellow fur.
Imagine a large, round Pokemon with a sleepy expression and brown bottom half.
Show me a Pokemon that uses hypnosis, featuring a unique yellow and brown color scheme.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon that combines a bear and a dream catcher in its design.
Make a Pokemon with a round body and a tendency to be lazy and sleepy.
Design a Pokemon that has an interesting combination of yellow and brown colors.
Give me a Pokemon that could be found in grassy areas and is known for its psychic abilities.
